channel.title: Runescape-Xperia Development Page
channel.description:
[center][font=comic sans ms][size=36pt][b]Runescape-Xperia[/b][/size][/font][/center]
[b]Information:[/b] Runescape-Xperia is coded and founded by me, I started with the origonal server and client base that Sanity made. I've made some modifications to the client and the server, I haven't started getting into coding it just making some text neater and better as of the moment with me not having much time. I'm going to start coding and fixing the skills and economy and all the other stuff you would do when you actually code. Runescape-Xperia is owned by me with a co-owner called One. He helps me with some stuff although he isn't a great coder, I'm hoping this project goes far and people help me with my issues and all my problems as I not great with java and this project will be also helping me learn more java towards Runescape Private Servers.
[img]http://www.rs2006.net/favicon.ico[/img]Official Forums [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/RunescapeXperia?feature=mhee][img]http://my.ebrainiacs.com/service/themes/html/ebDefault/icons/eb/youtube_favicon.png[/img]YouTube Channel[/url] [email=Runescape_Xperia@hotmail.com][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/Themes/core/images/email_sm.gif[/img]E-Mail Me[/email]
[b]Key:[/b] Green - Complete. Orange - Started. Red - Not Started.
[b]Server Additions:[/b] Skillcape equipting the the right slots. New home added. Gnomegliders added. 100% Lumbridge Autospawn added. Runescape like shops. 100% Skillcape emotes. Funpk. Wilderness. Non-Glitching NPCS. NPC Clipping. NPC Dialogues. Decent PVM. Decent PVP. Fix special timers. Add minigames.
[b]Client Additions:[/b] Added A new tab on the bottom left for updates and stuff. Added Skillcape button to the emotes list. Add more emotes. Add a couple of new buttons on my equipment tab. Fix the child board in the skills tab.
[i]These are the only things I can think of right now, I need help with adding 100% Skill cape emotes. NPC Clipping, NPC Dialogues, Non-Glitching Npcs. if anyone can offer help can you please E-mail at: Runescape_Xperia@hotmail.com Thank-you, I hope this comes far and I can get help and make this a decent server.[/i]

item.title: Runescape-Xperia Development Page
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

Good luck with the development, this seems a bit interesting so I’ll be coming back to this thread after a while to check up on some things.

Thanks man, I hope it comes really far and it can help me learn java more. But i do hope people will be able to help me.

Pr0ject pvp:

Very interesting gl

Thanks Buddyy!

Read full topic

item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

[center][font=comic sans ms][size=36pt]Runescape-Xperia[/size][/font][/center]

Information:
Runescape-Xperia is coded and founded by me, I started with the origonal server and client base that Sanity made. I’ve made some modifications to the client and the server, I haven’t started getting into coding it just making some text neater and better as of the moment with me not having much time. I’m going to start coding and fixing the skills and economy and all the other stuff you would do when you actually code. Runescape-Xperia is owned by me with a co-owner called One. He helps me with some stuff although he isn’t a great coder, I’m hoping this project goes far and people help me with my issues and all my problems as I not great with java and this project will be also helping me learn more java towards Runescape Private Servers.

Official Forums
YouTube Channel
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/Themes/core/images/email_sm.gif[/img]E-Mail Me

Key:
Green - Complete.
Orange - Started.
Red - Not Started.

Server Additions:
Skillcape equipting the the right slots.
New home added.
Gnomegliders added.
100% Lumbridge Autospawn added.
Runescape like shops.
100% Skillcape emotes.
Funpk.
Wilderness.
Non-Glitching NPCS.
NPC Clipping.
NPC Dialogues.
Decent PVM.
Decent PVP.
Fix special timers.
Add minigames.

Client Additions:
Added A new tab on the bottom left for updates and stuff.
Added Skillcape button to the emotes list.
Add more emotes.
Add a couple of new buttons on my equipment tab.
Fix the child board in the skills tab.

These are the only things I can think of right now, I need help with adding 100% Skill cape emotes. NPC Clipping, NPC Dialogues, Non-Glitching Npcs. if anyone can offer help can you please E-mail at: Runescape_Xperia@hotmail.com Thank-you, I hope this comes far and I can get help and make this a decent server.
